job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: The data science team at iRobot builds models, runs experiments, and conducts analyses to understand our fleet of millions of consumer robots. Our expertise in machine learning, statistical analysis, experimentation, and focus on the customer help us to produce data-driven digital features for robots and users around the world. Join our team as a data scientist with a focus on marketing applications!
